name: sucid

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, csuc(c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, csuc(c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ suc(c0)
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → c0 ∈ suc(c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, csuc(c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, csuc(c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ suc(c0)
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → c0 ∈ suc(c0))

comment: A set belongs to its successor. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-1994.) (Proof shortened by Alan Sare, 18-Feb-2012.) (Proof shortened by Scott Fenton, 20-Feb-2012.)
